'''Warped wart blocks''' are a decorative [[block]] found in [[warped forest]]s, generating as part of [[huge warped fungus]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Warped wart blocks can be [[Breaking|mine]]d using any [[Tools|tool]] or by hand, but a [[hoe]] is the fastest way to break it.

{{breaking row
| horizontal = 1
| Warped Wart Block
| Hoe
| Any}}

=== Natural generation ===
Warped wart blocks generate as part of [[huge warped fungus]] which generate within [[warped forest]]s.

{{Block distribution}}

===Post generation===
{{Main|Huge warped fungus#Growth}}
Using [[bone meal]] on a [[warped fungus]] that is planted on [[warped nylium]] has a 40% chance to grow into its huge equivalent, generating Warped wart blocks as part of it.

== Usage ==
=== Composting ===
Warped wart blocks can be fed into a [[composter]] with an 85% chance of leveling up the pile.
